Pre-Game Insights: Portugal are set to make a couple of alterations to their starting XI for the clash with Georgia on Wednesday evening at Euro 2024.
Rafael Leao will be unavailable due to picking up his second caution of the tournament.
Joao Felix or Pedro Neto is likely to start on the left flank.
Nelson Semedo and Joao Cancelo could replace Nuno Mendes in the defense.
Francisco Conceicao and Joao Palhinha are one yellow card away from suspension for the knockout stages.
Cristiano Ronaldo is in line to make his 50th appearance at a major tournament for the Selecao if selected.
Manchester City and Manchester United players are expected to start.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The city of Manchester is set to be heavily featured for Portugal in attacking areas.
Portugal won 2-0 against Georgia with goals from Kvaratskhelia, Mikautadze, and Mekvabishvili.
